message.content:
cs.IT, cs.SY, cs.MA, cs.NI, cs.LG 

The paper deals with designing resource allocation strategies for power constrained sensor networks, which is a problem commonly studied in the field of information theory (cs.IT) and control systems (cs.SY). The proposed spatial whitening scheme involves matrix operations and optimization, which are also common in the fields of linear algebra (cs.MA) and numerical analysis (cs.NI). Finally, the paper demonstrates the efficacy of the proposed framework for bit-allocation in distributed estimation, which is a problem commonly studied in the field of machine learning (cs.LG).
